description: Coordinates the support workflow: routes user queries to the KB agent for answers, presents the response with escalation option, and orchestrates ticket creation + email notification when escalation is triggered

example_response.answer: The response to show the user
example_response.source: Where the answer came from: knowledge_base, escalation, or combined
example_response.ticket_id: The ticket ID if escalation occurred
example_response.ticket_subject: The ticket subject if escalation occurred
example_response.confidence: Confidence level of the KB answer if applicable
